title: Number of the Beast
quote: Woe to you, oh Earth and Sea,
for the Devil sends the beast with wrath
Because he knows the time is short.
reckon the number of the beast;
For it is a human number
Its number is Six hundred and sixty six
comment: To be honest, this one is kind of a trick question, as very similar verses are in the bible. But those are also in the quiz, so you can get those right.
